about_the_game:
About Project DomeForge

Please Note: This game is currently in the Alpha testing phase, and the following content is subject to change:

  • Core gameplay is being refined, and some features are not yet finalized.

  • The game may contain bugs or areas needing optimization.

  • The combat system is being expanded, numerical balance is under adjustment, and more procedurally generated content is being added.

Future Development Plans:

  • More Content: Adds new artifacts, enemies, levels, and storylines.

  • Official Release: Aiming to launch the complete version in the future.

  • Language support:English and other language support

Highly value your feedback and suggestions, which will helps improve the game!

In the world of Project DomeForge, Earth is under siege from an alien invasion. The Defense Force has deployed elite warriors—you—on a critical mission: harness advanced technology and powerful artifacts to defeat the invaders and restore Earth’s safety. Along the way, you will uncover increasingly powerful artifacts imbued with the mystical energy of ancient civilizations, granting you unparalleled combat power. However, the alien foes are evolving and growing stronger, making every step of your mission filled with unpredictable challenges.

Core Features

A Perfect Blend of Combat and Strategy
Every battle is intense and thrilling. With enemies closing in, limited resources, and strategic choices to make, you'll need to think fast. Defeat your foes, collect artifacts, and enhance your abilities to become an unstoppable war machine.

Diverse Artifact System
Artifacts grant unique abilities and can even change your combat style. Will you choose to boost your attack power, increase defense, or acquire powerful special skills? The choice is yours, driven by your strategy and tactical needs.

Procedurally Generated Combat Environments
As a rogue-like game, every session of Project Tianzhu features randomly generated maps and enemy lineups. Each playthrough offers a fresh set of combat challenges and map layouts for a unique experience every time.

Progression and Endless Challenges
As you grow stronger, so do your enemies, making battles increasingly intense. Death will reset your progress, but the artifacts and experience you gather will help you gradually grow more powerful. Breaking through the seemingly impossible requires not only strength but also wisdom and perseverance.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400); AMD FX-4300 (4 * 3800)
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 Ti (1024 VRAM); Radeon HD 7750 (1024 VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2048 VRAM); Radeon R9 380 (2048 VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
